title.description: The display title of the module.

publishDate.description: The date when the module was first published.

updateDate.description: The date when the module was last updated.

changeLog.description: A summary of changes in text format.

changes.description: Detailed list of changes, categorized by title.

description.description: A brief description of the module.

requireAppBuild.description: The minimum application build number required for this module.

engines.description: Specifies the versions of LynxHub APIs this module is compatible with.

moduleApi.description: The compatible SemVer range for the LynxHub Module API (e.g., '^1.0.0').

extensionApi.description: The compatible SemVer range for the LynxHub Extension API (e.g., '^2.1.0').

repoUrl.description: Repository address to be cloned when the user installs the module.

logoUrl.description: URL address to a logo picture or a relative path to the image file. A relative path will start with './'.

owner.description: Indicates if the WebUI or the repository provided by this module is owned by you.

label.description: The label for the changelog item.

title.description: The title of the changelog section (e.g., 'New Features', 'Bug Fixes').

items.description: A list of individual changelog items for this section.
